title.rendered: Aqualis ASA : Mandatory notification of trade

content.rendered:
Oslo, 12 January 2015

On 12 January 2015, Aman Marine Ltd, a company controlled by Reuben Segal, Director Middle East at Aqualis, acquired 2’525 shares at an average purchase price of NOK 7.00 per share. After this transaction Reuben Segal, and related parties, hold 706’653 shares in Aqualis ASA.

*****

Contact:

Christian Opsahl
CFO
+47 901 101 53
christian.opsahl@aqualisbraemar.com

This information is subject of the disclosure requirements pursuant to section 5-12 of the Norwegian Securities Trading Act.

jetpack-related-posts.title: Mandatory notification of trade - primary insider
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Asker, 27 July 2018: The following primary insiders have purchased shares in Aqualis ASA. Reuben Segal, COO, acquired 21,471 shares at an average purchase price of NOK 4,786 per share (through his wholly owned company AmAn Marine Limited). Following this transaction Reuben Segal holds 1,376,323 shares in total. This information…

jetpack-related-posts.title: Qatar office for AqualisBraemar
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: 4 September 2015 – Offshore marine and engineering consultancy AqualisBraemar continues to expand its international footprint and opens a new office in Doha, Qatar. AqualisBraemar, part of Oslo-listed Aqualis ASA, has opened 16 offices in 11 countries worldwide since its establishment just over two years ago. In the Middle East,…

jetpack-related-posts.title: Aqualis ASA: CFO appointment
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: 31 December 2015 - Energy consulting group Aqualis ASA has appointed Kim Boman as new CFO. Mr Boman has almost 20 years' experience, primarily from corporate finance and investor relations roles. He was previously head of investor relations for REC Solar ASA.
